channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+3870] CSI: Modern computer technology at its best.
[+2916] 50 Kick-Ass Websites You Need to Know About
item.description: Unlike some lists you may have seen, which try to name the very "best" websites you already know about, we've chosen instead to highlight 50 of our favorite sites that fly under most people's radar. These sites include useful references, powerful web apps, and the unknown blogs you must absolutely bookmark.

item.title: [+2791] The Left Wing vs Right Wing World (INFOGRAPHIC)
item.description: Of course, the political spectrum is not quite so polarised. Actually, it’s more of a diamond shape, apparently. But this is how it’s mostly presented via the media – left wing vs. right wing, liberal vs. conservative, Labour vs Tory. And perhaps in our minds too…

item.title: [+2021] I would not enjoy this fortune in my cookie. You? [PIC]
[+1828] Everybody’s Got A Neighbor Like This
item.description: Ok, so, I think everyone’s had a neighbor like this at some point and if you haven’t, you’re lucky, cause it blows.

item.title: [+1494] Crazy Man Backflips Down Huge Sandune (Video)
item.description: This guy demonstrates the fastest way to get down a sand dune. Amazing.

item.title: [+1174] Florida Woman's Rape Called A "Pre-Existing Condition" By In
item.description: In 2002, Chris Turner, a health insurance agent from Tampa, Florida, was drugged and raped during a business trip. That rape was called a "pre-existing condition" by several health insurance companies, which would have disqualified her for care.

item.title: [+1153] Top 23 Reverse Photo Bombs on the Web
item.description: Because if you don't take control of the photo, then you're the one that's going to get bombed. Or something.

item.title: [+1134] Um... Seriously?!
item.description: This is just... no... seriously... wtf, why?!

item.title: [+1051] Pickup Lines Of 10 Historical Figures
item.description: "You know, there is something I could eat during a hunger strike."

item.title: [+1045] This is the best Halloween costume ever!! [PIC]
item.description: That middle head is so fake....

item.title: [+875] The 10 Scariest Videos on the Internet
item.description: Marcus Leshock counts down the Top 10 Scariest Videos on the Internet. Put those diapers on!

item.title: [+854] How Panicked Parents Skipping Shots Endangers Us All
item.description: This isn’t a religious dispute, like the debate over creationism and intelligent design. It’s a challenge to traditional science that crosses party, class, and religious lines. It is partly a reaction to Big Pharma’s blunders and PR missteps, from Vioxx to illegal marketing ploys, which have encouraged a distrust of experts.

item.title: [+840] 'Always Sunny' Heading to Comedy Central for Syndication
item.description: "It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia" cometh to Comedy Central. The cabler has secured basic cable off-net rights to "Sunny," which will join Comedy Central's lineup next summer. FX will continue to air original episodes of "Sunny," which is currently in its fifth season. FX has already ordered sixth and seventh seasons of the show.

item.title: [+600] What is the big deal about Meghan McCain's tits?
item.description: There are millions of tits on the Internet - what makes her revealing photo more shocking than the others? Sillier than the slut-shaming is McCain's response to it, wherein she plays stupid.

item.title: [+589] 5 New Technologies That Will Change Everything
item.description: 3D TV, HTML5, video over Wi-Fi, superfast USB, and mobile "augmented reality" will emerge as breakthrough technologies in the next few years. Here's a preview of what they do and how they work.

item.title: [+578] 10 Internet Memes That Can Still Make You Laugh
item.description: From LOL cats to Chuck Norris - and, yes, even the mighty Rick Roll - these memes can still make you laugh. C'mon, those cats are pretty damn cute.

item.title: [+557] Drunkest Guy Ever Tries to Buy Beer, Gets Remixed [VIDEOS]
item.description: Sure, you've seen the vid of the drunkest guy ever trying to buy beer. But have you seen the Daft Punk remix? The silent film version? The one set to "He Ain't With Me Now"? Ah, the Intertubes never do let us down, do they? There's no video that can't be remixed 12 ways to Saturday. (Or, in this case, six.)

item.title: [+540] Mouse Inside Your PC Eating Your Cat5 (PICS)
item.description: Amy, from Somerset, England, found this little mouse in her PC case. She believes one of our cats that promptly made it's home in our PC. ... It was quite fun trying to remove it, but I think it was quite happy in there."

item.title: [+531] McLovin Induces Public Nudity [Video]
item.description: 25-year-old Hawaiian organ donor McLovin is still scoring huge with the ladies -- and last night, he not only got a busty babe to flash him ... he also took her home!
